DOC.brief_summary: The Purpose study compare effect 2 type dietary fiber , psyllium microcrystalline cellulose ( MCC ) , glycemic measure subject impair fast glucose .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Psyllium Microcrystalline Cellulose Glycemic Measures Subjects With Impaired Fasting Glucose
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct single study center . Approximately 40 subject pre-type 2 diabetes enrol randomize study . This 22-week study consist 3 period : 8-week treatment period ( Visits 2-4 ) , 6-week washout period , 8-week treatment period ( Visits 5-7 ) .
DOC.criteria: male female , least 18 year age generally good health pretype 2 diabetes population ; female , postmenopausal childbearing capacity agree use adequate form contraception use psyllium containing product within past 3 month ; willing refrain take psyllium containing product study ; willing maintain lifestyle habit duration study ; fast serum glucose 110 125 mg/dL female , pregnant nursing ( lactate ) ; history diabetes ( diagnosis ) currently take medication diabetes participate clinical drug study use investigational drug previous 30 day ; symptom sign suggestive significant underlying disease , acute onset new symptom sign major organ disease , could become unstable trial require urgent medical intervention evidence treatment history malignancy within previous 5 year ; currently alcohol dependent ; use antipsychotic previous 3 month ; use systemic steroidal agent within last 30 day ; use oral systemic antibiotic overthecounter ( OTC ) bactericidal medication ( eg , bismuth salt ) within last 30 day ; take medication may affect blood glucose GI motility ( eg , calcium channel blocker , beta blocker , antimuscarinics , salicylates etc . ) less 30 day 5 time half life drug ( need stable medication ) ; evidence immunodeficiency include subject currently take systemic corticosteroid immunosuppressive drug major psychiatric disorder , include major depression , psychosis , alcohol substance abuse within past 2 year ; know sensitivity allergy component study product , include psyllium aspartame ( see Section 3.5.3 ) ; previously screen ( ie , Visit 1 procedure ) participation study fail meet entry criterion ; difficulty swallow
